TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConnectionPoint

Docs.summary: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint` in the MSDN library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Advise (object pUnkSink, out int pdwCookie);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Advise(object pUnkSink, int32 pdwCookie) cil managed

Docs.param: A reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
When this method returns, contains the connection cookie. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Advise` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumConnections(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumConnections ppEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the newly created enumerator. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionInterface(valuetype System.Guid pIID) cil managed

Docs.param: When this parameter returns, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionPointContainer(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPointContainer ppCPC) cil managed

Docs.param: When this parameter returns, contains the connectable object's interface. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unadvise(int32 dwCookie) cil managed

Docs.param: The connection cookie previously returned from the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint.Advise%2A> method.
Docs.summary: Terminates an advisory connection previously established through the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint.Advise%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Unadvise` in the MSDN library.
